29d47a80-f32e-4e54-8a2e-ac7467c63698.plaintext: An essential content block in the Volto frontend for Plone CMS that allows content editors to create compelling, action-oriented sections within a webpage. The CTA block is designed to encourage users to take a specific action, such as clicking a button, signing up for a service, or downloading a resource.
